title: (x) Lars von Trier's "Dogville" - Glaser Stencil {Franz}
content:
Does anyone know what font is used for the title? Thanks in advance - you guys are amazing!   
   
Scott   
   
 ![dogville font](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130212im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37758.jpg)
author: scottsherise

comments.content: I figured that would be fast, but what was that, like thirty seconds...and it's only 6 am on the west coast...THANK YOU!
